title: Ashley Graham shows off her baby bump in yellow dress with a smile...
text:
Ashley Graham beamed from ear-to-ear as she held her growing baby bump with pride in a new Instagram Story photo she posted on Thursday.

The Sports Illustrated model donned a mustard yellow maxi dress with trumpet sleeves.

Graham, 31, paired the bright frock with a pair of strappy bronze heels.

Sunny: Ashley Graham beamed from ear-to-ear as she held her growing baby bump with pride in a new Instagram Story photo she posted on Thursday

She then pumped up the fun even further in her Instagram Story by posting a video of herself having Revlon lipstick applied while acting silly in a beauty chair.

The 5ft 9in beauty looked into the camera, joking before a playful growl: 'I just scared my team and I didn't get it on Instagram!'

Graham announced her pregnancy in August alongside husband Justin Ervin in a sweet Instagram post.

LOL: She then pumped up the fun even further in her Instagram Story by posting a video of herself having Revlon lipstick applied while acting silly in a beauty chair

Playful: Graham placed a dollar-sign filter over her face and puckered her lips as she got her makeup done

Precious: Graham announced her pregnancy in August alongside husband Justin Ervin in a sweet Instagram post

'Nine years ago today, I married the love of my life,' she said. 'It has been the best journey with my favorite person in the world!

'Today, we are feeling so blessed, grateful and excited to celebrate with our GROWING FAMILY! Happy anniversary, @mrjustinervin. Life is about to get even better.'

And ever since the announcement, she hasn't been shy about flaunting her body to the public.

All out: And ever since the announcement, she hasn't been shy about flaunting her body to the public

The model posted a zoomed-in video of her unclothed body to Instagram on Monday complete with a sparkly filter.

'Getting bigger and bigger and trying to embrace my new body everyday. It’s a journey and I’m so thankful to have such a supportive community,' she captioned the video.

Graham and Ervin have been married since 2010.
